忺字的基本解释

忺
xiān
高兴；适意：“散帙挥毫总不忺。”

忺字的汉语字典释义

[①]［xiān］
［《洪武正韻》虚嚴切，平鹽］
(1)欢快；高兴。
(2)欲；愿。
(3)牵挂；思念。

忺字的康熙字典解释

【卯集上】【心字部】　忺； 康熙笔画：8； 页码：页378第30
【韻會】【正韻】?虛嚴切，音杴。意所欲也。【揚子·方言】靑齊呼意所好爲忺。【林逋雜興詩】散帙揮毫總不忺。◎按張忻訂正篇海，虛嚴切，音杴。字彙本之，舊本篇海音含，出氣也。

忺字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
忺字的起名意思

高兴，适合心意。

忺
Basic explanation of words
忺
xiān
Happy; agreeable: "You will never feel uncomfortable when you stray a little bit."
忺
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［xiān］
["Hongwu Zhengyun" is virtual and strict, flat salt]
(1) Cheerful; happy.
(2) Desire; willing.
(3) Worry; miss.
忺
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Mao Ji 1] [Heart Word Department] 　忺; Kangxi strokes: 8; Page number: page 378 to 30
[Rhyme Club] [Positive Rhyme]? Void and strict, soundless. Whatever you want. 【Yangtze Dialect】Qian Qi said that all his intentions are good for him. [Lin Bu's Miscellaneous Hing Poems] You will never feel uncomfortable when you stray a little bit. ◎According to Zhang Xin's revised chapter, the sea is empty and strict, and the sound is faint. The vocabulary is in the original, and the old version contains the sound of the sea, and it is also venting.
